data.title: Cat Attack Archives
data.text:
A ginger Persian cat has a sadistic side in this film adaptation of the popular Gabriel García Márquez novel.

Read More » » »

by Mark Murton Directed by: John Llewellyn Moxey Cat Out of the Bag Alert! This review contains some spoilers for this film! Synopsis: On a camping trip to the California mountains, Steven Anders (Peter Graves) and his two teenage children are exploring a cave when they experience an earthquake.
